title: The Radium Girls and the cotton revolution
itunes:title: The Radium Girls and the cotton revolution
itunes:subtitle: Kate Moore describes the tragic story of a group of women who were exposed to radium in 20th-century America, while Terry Wyke visits a key site from Britain’s textile heritage  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
description:
Kate Moore describes the tragic story of a group of women who were exposed to radium in 20th-century America, while Terry Wyke visits a key site from Britain’s textile heritage
